snippet: Hundreds of thousands of people followed the violence in Kiev on Tuesday as it unfolded, reading updates from reporters and activists in Independence Square and watching the local website Espreso.tv’s live YouTube video stream from the besieged...
abstract: Hundreds of thousands of people followed the violence in Kiev on Tuesday as it unfolded, reading updates from reporters and activists in Independence Square and watching the local website Espreso.tv’s live YouTube video stream from the besieged protest camp there.

headline.main: Online Video of Intense Clashes in Kiev
